Set period of mourning for Hafez al Assad 
     Pyongyang, June 12 (KCNA) -- The DPRK government decided to set the period from June 12 to 16, Juche 89 (2000) for mourning and fly flags at half-mast at the appointed places as regards the demise of President of the Syrian Arab Republic Hafez al Assad, who is also General Secretary of the Arab Socialist Baath Party and commander-in-chief of the Syrian Army and Armed Forces.
